text: The 1130s BC is a decade which lasted from 1139 BC to 1130 BC. ==Events and trends== * 1137 BC—Ramses VII begins his reign as the sixth ruler of the Twentieth dynasty of Egypt. * 1135 BC—Oxyntes, legendary King of Athens, dies after a reign of 12 years and is succeeded by his eldest son Apheidas. * 1134 BC—Apheidas, legendary King of Athens, is assassinated and succeeded by his younger brother Thymoetes after a reign of 1 year. ==Significant people==
title: 1130s BC
